thread.section_title: Select Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Stayed for 4 nights with family of 3
thread.title_full: Stayed for 4 nights with family of 3 - Review of Select Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Janice B
title: Stayed for 4 nights with family of 3
text: Stayed in a junior executive suite, was a wonderful stay. Great location, great service, very spacious and modern room which we appreciated at the end of long days of sightseeing in Paris. Fantastic space for a family of 3. Only negative was that we could hear a lot of street noise at night, but this is not uncommon for anywhere you stay in central Paris. Would happily stay here again.
